Title: Look Who's Purging Now
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Dan Harmon, Ryan Ridley, Justin Roiland, Mike McMahan (story editor), Matt Roller (story editor), Brian Wysol (story editor), Tom Kauffman (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Rick and Morty arrive on an alien planet to fix their ship just as the day of the purge begins there, Jerry and Summer work on their father-daughter relationship, but his lack of employment keeps coming up.
